title: Effect of expansionary MP on RGDP and PL in LR

content.question: If wages and prices are perfectly flexible and inflation is correctly anticipated, then an expansionary monetary policy will affect the real output and price level in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Real Output Price Level Increase Increase
Real Output Price Level Increase Decrease
Real Output Price Level Increase Not change
Real Output Price Level Not change Increase
Real Output Price Level Not change Not change

content.answer: Real Output Price Level Not change Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
